name: Dreamcat
description:
This is a 320x240 adventure game, with 8-bit resources optimized for ScummVM on lower end machines like Dreamcast.

It is intended to be a template for anyone to create their own adventures to run on the Dreamcast (or any platform that ScummVM supports).

This project uses the Wintermute engine by dead:code.

http://dead-code.org/home/

It is optimized for use with the Wintermute engine in ScummVM, which was developed by somaen, t0by, and the ScummVM team.

http://www.scummvm.org/

The full source-code is available as well:

https://github.com/JenniBee/dreamcat
